name: Don't Sink (itch) (MartRoks, JoeyVrij)
description:
Concept:

Your ship is under attack! You are the lowest in rank and have to fix the holes caused by cannonballs. Try to get the best time possible.

Made for the 2020 Brackeys Gamejam

Controls:

AD for Left and Right, W for Jumping, Shift for filling up holes and Spacebar to hold a crate.

You can play this game as often as you would like.

Good Luck, Let us know what you think!
